sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个形容词均可表示"固执的，顽固的"之意。
means: obstinate ： 指无理地固执已见或听不进他人忠告、意见等顽固性格。
stubborn ： 用于褒义指坚定不移，执意顽强；用于贬义指固执已见，侧重生性固执。

sentence.Network_en: Formal, exact and obstinate, he was also cold, suspicious, touchy and tactless.
sentence.Network_cn: 严肃、严谨、倔强的他同时又冷漠、多疑、敏感、不会变通。

sentence.Network_en: He can be very obstinate when he wants to be!
sentence.Network_cn: 他的犟劲儿一上来，简直执拗得要命！

PerfectNetExp.abs: 生日花_百度百科 ... 体质虚弱（ Weak） 固执（obstinate）（ Obstinate） 健康（ Good Health）.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... apostate n 变节者 obstinate a 顽固的 obstinacy n 顽固，顽强.
赵丽——GRE词汇课 - 豆丁网 ... persistent 固执的 obstinate 固执的 persistence of energy abysmal 极深的.
英语常用8000词汇表·整理好(下) - 豆丁网 ... obstacle n. 障碍(物) obstinate adj. 固执的，顽强的 obstruction n. 堵塞，妨碍.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Latin obstinatus, past participle of obstinare 'persist'

entry.def: If you describe someone as obstinate, you are being critical of them because they are very determined to do what they want, and refuse to change their mind or be persuaded to do something else.

example.ex: He is obstinate and determined and will not give up...
example.tran: 他非常顽固，而且又铁了心，是不会放弃的。

example.ex: She was a wicked and obstinate child.
example.tran: 她是个淘气又执拗的孩子。

entry.tran: 难以移动的；难以改变的；难以消除的
entry.def: You can describe things as obstinate when they are difficult to move, change, or destroy.

example.ex: ...rusted farm equipment strewn among the obstinate weeds.
example.tran: 扔在恣意蔓生的杂草丛中的锈迹斑斑的农具

sentences.sentence: "he obstinates himself against all rational arguments"
"an obstinate child with a violent temper"

auth_sentence.content: Obstinate as a mule over that, he was.

auth_sentence.content: Its not that methodological naturalism is bad or wrong or obstinate.

auth_sentence.content: Do insults aimed at remarkably obstinate and annoying people count as abuse?

stems_affixes.word_buile: ob反+stin站,立+ate……的→和别人反着站

means.word_mean: 固执的;顽固的, 倔强的

sentences.en: He is so obstinate that he still tries to defend his theory,although it has been proved wrong.
sentences.cn: 他固执极了,尽管他的理论已被证明是错的,可他还在设法为其辩护。

sentences.en: She’s too obstinate to let anyone help her.
sentences.cn: 她太倔强了, 不会让任何人帮她的。
